statements: UPDATE BatchNormalization SET batch_mean = 0.5, normalized_mean = -0.2 WHERE model_id = '4585bca8-9fb6-4a80-a1ac-442a65087c02' AND layer_id = 'a7ea58ed-9c80-42c4-b4ae-1a29c72bff23';
